title: Divisional Round preview
itunes:title: Divisional Round preview
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling & Gregg Rosenthal – discuss all the latest news from around the NFL including the Chargers relocating to Los Angeles in 2017, and the Rams hiring former Redskins offensive coordinator Sean McVay as their new head coach. Then, the heroes go game-by-game previewing each Divisional Round matchup, and reveal which team is their “lock of the week.”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
